roleset.name: take a record of a person's fingerprints (or metaphorical extension)

role.descr: crime leading to arrest and fingerprinting
domain in which there is a unique signature, akin to fingerprints

example.name: fingerprint-v
example.text: The North Koreans actually fingerprinted him for snagging a stupid poster and sentenced him to 15 yrs?!?

example.name: fingerprinting-n
example.text: This process is formally termed DNA profiling , but may also be called `` genetic fingerprinting '' .

roleset.note: FINGERPRINT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
